AxisType Class

Defined in: input/charts/AxisType.js:1
Module: charts

AxisType is an abstract class that manages the data for an axis.

  • Index
  • Methods
  • Properties
  • Attributes

_hasDataOverflow

() protected

Defined in input/charts/AxisType.js:404

Checks to see if data extends beyond the range of the axis. If so, that data will need to be hidden. This method is internal, temporary and subject to removal in the future.

Returns:

Boolean

Attributes

data

Array

Defined in input/charts/AxisType.js:669

Array of axis data

dataMaximum

Number

Defined in input/charts/AxisType.js:544

The maximum value contained in the data array. Used for maximum when autoMax is true.

dataMinimum

Number

Defined in input/charts/AxisType.js:594

The minimum value contained in the data array. Used for minimum when autoMin is true.

dataProvider

Array

Defined in input/charts/AxisType.js:530

Instance of ChartDataProvider that the class uses to build its own data.

keyCollection

Array

Defined in input/charts/AxisType.js:686

Array containing all the keys in the axis.

keys

Object

Defined in input/charts/AxisType.js:447

Hash of array identifed by a string value.

maximum

Number

Defined in input/charts/AxisType.js:562

The maximum value that will appear on an axis.

minimum

Number

Defined in input/charts/AxisType.js:612

The minimum value that will appear on an axis.

roundingMethod

String

Defined in input/charts/AxisType.js:491

Indicates how to round unit values.

niceNumber
Units will be smoothed based on the number of ticks and data range.
auto
If the range is greater than 1, the units will be rounded.
numeric value
Units will be equal to the numeric value.
null
No rounding will occur.

Default: niceNumber

setMax

Boolean

Defined in input/charts/AxisType.js:637

Determines whether the maximum is calculated or explicitly set by the user.

setMin

Boolean

Defined in input/charts/AxisType.js:653

Determines whether the minimum is calculated or explicitly set by the user.

type

String

Defined in input/charts/AxisType.js:508

Returns the type of axis data

time
Manages time data
stacked
Manages stacked numeric data

numeric
Manages numeric data
category
Manages categorical data
